coreAttributes.authorTag: "MFD by DSG Beverages GmbH" is engraved into the bottle
coreAttributes.name: arcane firebomb
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle filled with highly flammable fish oil and a rag, designed to shatter on impact and shower the immediate area with burning oil.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] the arcane firebomb. The rag stuffed down the bottle's neck immediately ignites but the arcane flames don't seem to be consuming it.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] the arcane firebomb away. The rag immediately extinguishes itself.
coreAttributes.onHitEffect: #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_LINGERING_FLAMES)) [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_LINGERING_FLAMES, 6)] The burning oil pools around [npc2.name], [style.boldFire(causing the flames to lick at [npc2.her] [npc2.feet]!)] #ENDIF #IF (npc.getMainWeapon(0) != null && npc.getMainWeapon(0).getWeaponType().equals(WEAPON_dsg_hlf_weap_pbomb)) [##npc.unequipMainWeaponIntoVoid(0, true)] #ELSEIF (npc.getOffhandWeapon(0) != null && npc.getOffhandWeapon(0).getWeaponType().equals(WEAPON_dsg_hlf_weap_pbomb)) [##npc.unequipOffhandWeaponIntoVoid(0, true)] #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(throw)] the firebomb at [npc2.name]. The bottle shatters on impact with [npc2.namePos] aura, engulfing [npc2.herHim] in fire!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(throw)] the firebomb at [npc2.name]. The bottle misses [npc2.herHim] completely and shatters in the distance, creating an impressive but useless fireball.
